thread.title: Design & Promote Hosts Free SEO For Photographers Seminar At Procam Chicago Camera Store
thread.title_full: Design & Promote Hosts Free SEO For Photographers Seminar At Procam Chicago Camera Store - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Design & Promote Hosts Free SEO For Photographers Seminar At Procam Chicago Camera Store
text:
Design & Promote
Design & Promote, an SEO company in Chicago, will hold the free seminar November 10, 2015 at ProCam in Aurora, IL. Attendance is free but RSVP is required.
NAPERVILLE, Ill. -- Design & Promote , an SEO company in Chicago , is offering a free seminar for photographers on November 10, 2015 . The seminar will teach photographers how to optimize their images to show up in Google search results.
"SEO for Photographers (Or for anyone that has images on their website)" will be held at ProCam Photo & Video Gear, located at 4300 Westbrook Drive in Aurora, IL from 7-9 p.m. The event is free, but RSVPs are required. The event is not solely for photographers, anyone who uses a lot of images in their web design in Chicago will benefit from attending.
The seminar will be led by Bruce Jones , search engine optimization expert, professional photographer, and CEO of Design & Promote, an SEO firm in Chicago . Bruce will demonstrate how to get website and photo galleries to appear in the top of Google searches and how to convert more visitors into qualified leads when they find those images.
"I have a lot of friends who are photographers, and they think that being number 1 in Google was just because of luck. But it's not, SEO is a science," explained Bruce Jones , CEO of Design & Promote ( www.designandpromote.com ).
As will be explained during the seminar, a thoughtful approach to SEO (search engine optimization) is the solution to improving online visibility. Most people associate SEO with text, but the same theories apply to images as well.
The seminar will cover:
Think Like Your Customer Competitor Analysis Keyword Research Correct Image Naming & Tagging Where To Use Keywords On Your Website Backlink Building Drip Marketing To register for "SEO for Photographers (or for anyone that has images on their website)," click here or visit www.designandpromote.com .
About Design & Promote: Design & Promote is a Chicago search engine optimization (SEO) and integrated marketing company based in Naperville . The company employs web designers, SEO experts, and marketing consultants to help clients create an effective internet presence that converts customers and ranks high within Google and other search engines.
